Salma Mumin bụ onye Ghana na-eme ihe nkiri. Onyinye ya na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Ghana emeela ka ọ nweta ọtụtụ otuto, gụnyere Best International New Actress n'afọ 2014 Papyrus Magazine Screen Actors Awards na Best Actress in a Leading Role n'afọ 2019 Ghana Movie Awards.
A mụrụ Mumin na Wa, na Upper West Region nke Ghana (Northern Region of Ghana) ma nọrọ n'oge ọ bụ nwata na mpaghara ahụ
Ọ gara Odorkor 1 Primary School maka agụmakwụkwọ ya wee kwaga Insaaniyya Senior Secondary School. O mechara kwaga Accra ịchụso ọrụ ihe nkiri ya.

Mumin mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya n'afọ 2007 ebe e gosipụtara ya na ihe nkiri Passion and Soul Kemgbe afọ 2012, ọ rụkwara ọrụ na ihe nkiri Seduction, No Apology, College Girls, Leave my wife, The Will, No Man's Land, nakwa What My Wife Doesn't Know, na John and John  Ihe nkiri mbụ ya bụ na I Love Your Husband 1, 2, na 3 n'afọ 2009
O sonyekwara na ihe nkiri You May Kill the Bride n'afọ 2016
Ọ nọkwa na ihe nkiri mba ụwa.
N'afọ 2015, o mepụtara ihe nkiri mbụ ya akpọrọ No Man's Land
A pụrụ ịhụ ihu Mumin na mbadaozi na mgbasa ozi TV na Ghana, gụnyere mgbasa ozi maka UniBank, Jumbo, Electromart na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
Azụmahịa TV mbụ ya bụ maka UniBank
Ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya nke Hollywood Nutritions Slim Smart
